video.title: Eureka
video.synopsis: When he becomes sheriff of a small town, an ex-U.S. marshal discovers that the citizens are scientists working for a top-secret research facility.

episodes.synopsis: Carter and friends are mysteriously transported to a dangerous military installation. Their journey will have life-altering repercussions.
episodes.title: Founder's Day

episodes.synopsis: Carter and his fellow travelers begin to realize the startling implications of their return to Eureka -- and of Dr. Grant's unnerving appearance.
episodes.title: A New World

episodes.synopsis: Blind rage is infecting everyone at Global Dynamics with potentially catastrophic results -- especially for Fargo.
episodes.title: All the Rage

episodes.synopsis: Allison struggles to relate to her son and deals with inadvertent mayhem during Eureka's Space Week festival, while Carter visits Zoe at Harvard.
episodes.title: The Story of 02

episodes.synopsis: Mysterious objects start popping up, threatening to erase Eureka, and Carter needs Claudia's help to fix it before the present becomes history.
episodes.title: Crossing Over

episodes.synopsis: Allison accepts Carter's offer to include Kevin in a camping trip for some guy time, while a peculiar relationship threatens Eureka.
episodes.title: Momstrosity

episodes.synopsis: Zoe visits and hints at a new heartthrob. Henry is courting his wife while Dr. Grant and Carter spar over Allison. Jo, meanwhile, is done with love.
episodes.title: Stoned

episodes.synopsis: As Grace finds a way to share her memories with Henry, the rest of Eureka faces the return of people from the recent (or not so recent) past.
episodes.title: The Ex Files

episodes.synopsis: Allison and Carter join forces personally as well as professionally when Jo and Fargo need help finding a stolen Global Dynamics project.
episodes.title: I'll Be Seeing You

episodes.synopsis: As the Global Dynamics employees celebrate at the company holiday party, staff member Dr. Noah Drummer nearly absconds with a volatile experiment.
episodes.title: O Little Town

episodes.synopsis: An "only in Eureka" case of cold feet halts a wedding while a secret experiment precipitates an event that will completely alter life in the town.
episodes.title: Liftoff

episodes.synopsis: When Eurekans start behaving oddly, Carter scours the town for a cause -- never suspecting that Allison, miles from home, is the one in real danger.
episodes.title: Reprise

episodes.synopsis: Carter and Jo try out a risk assessment system, but find that even it may not be a match for the dangerous level of competition among the scientists.
episodes.title: Glimpse

episodes.synopsis: Carter must solve an only-in-Eureka bank robbery before the town floats away, while Allison deals with unsettling episodes of lost time.
episodes.title: Up in the Air

episodes.synopsis: It's all-out war when Beverly Barlowe incapacitates everyone in town except Jo and Zoe. The duo must outwit Beverly before she completes her plan.
episodes.title: Omega Girls

episodes.synopsis: The Astraeus candidates endure psychological testing in deep isolation, not realizing that disaster looms just outside their door.
episodes.title: Of Mites and Men

episodes.synopsis: As relationship issues plague the Astraeus team, a meddlesome Department of Defense auditor arrives to assess Jack and Allison's romance.
episodes.title: Clash of the Titans

episodes.synopsis: As the candidates undergo interviews, Carter and Allison appeal the results of their relationship audit while trying to keep a lid on mishaps in town.
episodes.title: This One Time at Space Camp...

episodes.synopsis: Grace embraces an honor that strains her relationship with Henry while Deputy Andy becomes an accidental guinea pig for the Astraeus mission.
episodes.title: One Small Step

episodes.synopsis: Carter must fight off a plague of the most destructive objects in the universe even as a shocking development threatens the Astraeus ship and crew.
episodes.title: One Giant Leap

episodes.synopsis: A mysterious kaleidoscopic wave of color crashes over Eureka, leaving the entire town and its inhabitants animated.
episodes.title: Do You See What I See?

episodes.synopsis: After the Astraeus mission's launch to Titan, the crew manages to land the ship safely and find out they are back on Earth! What seemed like only a few hours was in fact a few years and the crewmembers have to re-adjust.
episodes.title: Lost

episodes.synopsis: Carter, Henry, Kevin and the rest of the town continue to search for the missing Astraeus crew. Kevin's strangelet detector discovers the ship's trail! But where they are and who has been hiding them will be a shock to everyone.
episodes.title: The Real Thing

episodes.synopsis: The ship is finally found but the crew has been taken. When Carter is tasked with attempting to rescue the kidnapped crew by following them into the virtual Eureka, will he be able to get them out before their matrix world collapses for good?
episodes.title: Force Quit

episodes.synopsis: With life back to normal, the Astraeus crew struggles to overcome their Matrix Eureka experience: what was real, what wasn't and what could become self-fulfilling prophecy.
episodes.title: Friendly Fire

episodes.synopsis: The Astraeus crew must move forward after their matrix ordeal, but it isn't easy. And a return visit from DOD psychological assessor Warren Hughes just adds to the pressure.
episodes.title: Jack of All Trades

episodes.synopsis: To better protect against potential security breaches, Henry implements a disaster preparedness drill for Global Dynamics. But the real-life simulation proves a little too disastrous.
episodes.title: Worst Case Scenario

episodes.synopsis: Fargo and Zane secretly work to retrieve Holly's "consciousness" from the Matrix Eureka computer mainframe.
episodes.title: Ex Machina

episodes.synopsis: Allison and Carter's engagement hits rough waters when Carter's attempt at romance traps them at the bottom of Lake Archimedes in a leaking sub.
episodes.title: In Too Deep

episodes.synopsis: When Allison's genius older brother comes to meet her new husband, Carter feels the pressure of not being smart enough to measure up.
episodes.title: Smarter Carter

episodes.synopsis: Carter's best-laid plans to give Allison a romantic honeymoon are thrown for a loop when their definitions of "romantic" differ greatly.
episodes.title: The Honeymooners

episodes.synopsis: When Grace's spying is revealed, mistrust is in the air. Maj. Shaw shows up to take control of the situation.
episodes.title: Mirror, Mirror

episodes.synopsis: The Smart Dust control unit is still on the fritz and wreaking havoc on the town's communications systems.
episodes.title: Double-Take

episodes.synopsis: The DOD is pulling the plug on Eureka.
episodes.title: Just Another Day
